baseline_texts: This image shows a small, cozy room with a red couch on the right side. There are several cushions on the couch in different colors. In front of the couch, there is an object covered with a checkered cloth, possibly a piece of furniture or an item being protected. On the left side of the room, there is a wooden table with chairs around it. Near the table, there is a TV on a wooden stand, along with some other items, including a small piece of furniture or storage unit below the TV. The floor has a patterned carpet or rug, and the walls are light-colored, contributing to a warm and homey atmosphere.

The frame shows a room with a tiled floor and a red sofa on the right side. On the sofa, there is a raised leg wearing a sock with a checkered pattern. In the background, there is a wooden dining table with chairs near a window with partially closed blinds. There's also a wooden cabinet or desk with a television or monitor placed on top. Some miscellaneous items are placed on the cabinet, including what looks like a cup or small container. The overall setting appears to be a cozy living or dining area.

The frame shows a small room with a checkered floor. On the right side, there is a red couch with a pillow or cushion on it. Against the far wall, there is a wooden desk or TV stand with various items on it, and a chair with a dark piece of clothing draped over it. Near the left side of the image, there is a wooden table with chairs around it, positioned next to a window with blinds. In the background, there is a wooden dining table with four chairs, and a window with blinds above it. There is also a TV atop a wooden TV stand on the right side near the back wall. The floor has a light-colored tile with a dotted pattern. The overall ambiance seems to be a cozy living or dining area.

This frame shows a cozy indoor room with a red sofa on the right side, adorned with several colorful cushions. To the left, there is a wooden dining table with matching chairs. Behind the table, there appears to be a wooden cabinet or desk with some items on top. The floor has a patterned tile design, and the walls are white. The overall atmosphere suggests a warm, lived-in space, likely a living or dining room.

The frame shows a cozy living space with a red sofa on the right side, adorned with several colorful cushions including orange and patterned ones. In the background, there is a wooden dining table with two chairs. Near the table, there is a window with closed blinds. Also visible is a wooden desk with a computer monitor on it, along with some miscellaneous items. The floor has a patterned carpet with dots. In the foreground, there appears to be a piece of clothing or fabric placed on a surface. The lighting in the room is warm and natural, suggesting it's daytime.
